description: The ability to quickly look at the network stats and get an impression of how the chain is progressing

options.content: Network Overview
Missed Slots
Liveness
No. of Validators

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "recent_slots" and r["_field"] == "block_number")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.filled == "0")
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "_value")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liveness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "liveness")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats" )
  |> keep(columns: ["signer"]) 
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "signer")
  |> count()

options.content: Best Block
Current Epoch

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "best_block_number")
  |> group(columns: ["best_block_number"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liveness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> last()

options.content: Justified Block
Finalisation
Justified Epoch

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liveness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "justified_block")
  |> group(columns: ["justified_block"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liveness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "current_epoch")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "finalized")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liveness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value - uint(v:1)}))

options.content: Finalized Block
Finalized Epoch

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liveness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "finalized")
  |> group(columns: ["finalized"])
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liveness")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "epoch")
  |> group(columns: ["epoch"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value - uint(v:2)}))

options.content: Blockspace Utilization
Legacy vs DynFee Tx Count per Block

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_gas_usage")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r._measurement == "transactions" and
      (r._field == "legacy_txs" or r._field == "dyn_fee_txs") and
      r._value > 0
    )
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "block_number", "_field", "_value"])
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:     ["_time", "block_number"],
      columnKey:  ["_field"],
      valueColumn:"_value"
    )
  // convert the block_number string into an integer field called "block"
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      block: int(v: r.block_number),
      legacy_txs: if exists r.legacy_txs then r.legacy_txs else 0,
      dyn_fee_txs: if exists r.dyn_fee_txs then r.dyn_fee_txs else 0
    }))
  |> yield(name: "txs_per_block")

options.content: Total Gas Used
Block Base Fee

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_gas_used")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

import "math"

// Main series: convert block_base_fee to float, aggregate by window,
// and scale the value by 10^13 to work in normalized units.
main = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "block_base_fee")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) }))
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value / math.pow(x: 10.0, y: 13.0) }))

// Horizontal line series: reuse the main series timestamps while setting the value to 2.
// (That is, 2 * 1e13 wei divided by 1e13 = 2.)
hline = main
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 2.0, _field: "Max Legacy Tx Gas Price" }))

// Union the two series so both are shown in the same panel.
union(tables: [main, hline])
  |> yield(name: "result")

options.content: Block Size
Transaction Count

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "storage_size")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "transactions")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_txs")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "block_stats")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "total_clauses")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

title: Network Overview
